data: Thundershowers hit just before midnight, drowning out the horn honks and noisemaker blare that usually signaled New Year’s on the Strip, bringing 1950 to the West Hollywood Substation in a wave of hot squeals with meat wagon backup.
New Year's | Strip | West Hollywood Substation

THUNDERSHOWERS HIT JUST before midnight, drowning out the horn honks and noisemaker blare that usually signaled New Year’s on the Strip, bringing 1950 to the West Hollywood Substation in a wave of hot squeals with meat wagon backup.
